attributes.action: Revoke the Charter of the Bank of England and have the Government create its own debt free currency
attributes.additional_details:
We require that the right of the Bank of England to dictate British Economic Policy is revoked and taken over by the government.

We require that Britain creates its own debt free currency.

We require that any future quantitative easing is conducted by giving money directly to British born citizens to pay off their debt rather than by buying banks toxic assets and buying bonds.
